channel.title: Hello iv recently got my own server
channel.description:
hello iv recently got my own server and i was wondering how to add a welcome message when someone logs in.
thanks

item.title: Hello iv recently got my own server
item.dc:creator: @dylanmate dylanmate
item.description:
@dylanmate wrote:

go in to your server folder go to client.java
use ctrl and f to search for either SendMessage or sM and keep pressing next until you find something like 'welcome to (your client name) ’ or whatever yours say when u log in.

hope this helps.

Read full topic
item.source: Hello iv recently got my own server

item.title: Hello iv recently got my own server
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

Most server’s already have a welcome Message, Just go in “client.java”, click ctrl+f, type welcome and press enter untill you find the default welcome message

Read full topic
